title: SC forms bench to hear Arshad Sharif murder case
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 01 (APP):The Supreme Court of Pakistanâ€™s Practice and Procedure Committee had formed a five member bench to hear suo-moto case regarding transparent investigation into Arshad Sharif murder case.
Justice Jamal Khan Mandokhail would head the bench while Justices including Muhammad Ali Mazhar, Ayesha Malik, Hassan Azhar Rizvi and Justice Athar Minallah would be part of the bench.
The case would be heard on the availability of the bench.
